department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Jinghui Cheng received his M.S. degree in Electrical Engineering and has been working as a game developer in industry for two years prior to pursuing his PhD. He is currently a PhD student in Computer Science at DePaul University, examining game design principals and game evaluation methods for diverse players. He is interested in human-centered approaches to design of computer systems, including video games. He is currently working on a project that aims at supporting the use and creation of customized games in brain injury rehabilitation.
